ISSUE.TITLE: Update usage of user_capabilities for Execution Environments
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Update usage of summary_fields for Execution Environments. `user_capabilities` was added as part of `summary_fields` for EE. Update the `ToolbarDeleteButton` component.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Expose the user capabilities dict for EEs (#8208)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update usage of summary_fields for execution environments Update usage of summary_fields for execution environments See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/8216
